 and three equally well-detailed model coaches. The locomotive is DCC-ready. (DCC is the digital control system for model railways allowing different trains to run at different speeds o the same tracks - DCC-ready indicates that the loco has a socket into which a DCC module can be slotted in future; the controller provided with the set is not DCC-compatible.)As with all Hornby starter sets	 but the track is fine otherwise. The fishplates are reassuringly tight	 which is a rather grand name for a large printed sheet of glossy paper with a suggested layout
null	null	null
 and for a ""railroad"" model the detail is very good! The Pullman coaches are equally attractive to look at	 while a fairly minimal amount	 it will not see too much heavy use anyway. The loco runs smoothly and quietly
